post.author: ergonaut
post.body:
but... // and / or \\ and \ I'm settling on \\ and \ at present


but is this folly, are they real specific to file types




yes its a bit cryptic

post.author: Lumpengnom
post.body: What are you talking about?

post.author: BloodRayne
post.body:
Forward slashes eq http or other protocol.
Backslashes eq file protocol.

e.g. fileshare:
\\fileserver\g$\docs\documents

e.g. other protocol
http://something/somewhat.htm
gopher://120.20.20.20/
ftp://ftp.microsoft.com

etc..etc..

3dsMax uses the standard fileprotocol for your operating system.
Windows: \\
*nux: //

Hope that helps.
Be less cyrptic next time.

post.author: ergonaut
post.body:
Hope that helps.
Be less cyrptic next time.[/quote]

Yes that helps.

The cryptic comes from haste, sorry about that.
